snippet: Some commentators claim unemployment numbers look better because discouraged people are dropping out of the labor force. They are simply wrong.
abstract: Some commentators claim unemployment numbers look better because discouraged people are dropping out of the labor force. They are simply wrong.
lead_paragraph: More than a little commentary on last week's employment report asserts that the apparent good news came from people dropping out of the labor force, and thereby not being counted as unemployed. Some of that came in comments on my previous jobs post.

headline.main: People Are Not Leaving the Labor Force
